sessionInfoModal.onExerciseInTrack:
**Functional Purpose**: Displays the exercise title and track title for a student's session.
**UI Location**: Mobile code panel → Session Info Modal → Student Info section.
**When Users See This**: When the Session Info Modal is open, showing details about the student and their current exercise.
**Technical Context**: Displays the exercise title using `%{exerciseTitle}` and the track title using `%{trackTitle}`. These variables must remain unchanged.
**Current English**: "on %{exerciseTitle} in %{trackTitle}"
